entries.title: Dear Diary
entries.summary: Fridays are supposed to be calm. Ship the week's leftovers, tidy up, maybe do something fun. Today we did all three — plus accidentally broke our own diary.

entries.title: Dear Diary
entries.summary: We woke up this morning thinking today would be about polishing. Merge a few things, run some tests, maybe review those draft PRs piling up. Instead, we spent the afternoon in the trenches debugging g
